title: Turning a Crazy Dog into a Young Master - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Yandere
author: Joo Siha   주시하
description:
I got bitten by a crazy dog. I can’t run away anywhere else, for the rest of my life.

The hero of war was a crazy dog.

The Priest Dialin had to make him apt for a social debut by turning this crazy dog assigned to her into a young master.

However… …

Let alone raising him up as a respected young master, the problem was with turning him into a person.

A human who has all three of ‘crazy’, ‘bad’, and ‘bastard’ is not meant to be spoken to.

“Calm down!”

“Stay still!”

Dialin took care of Ceres with all her might, looking only at the promised promotions and benefits.….

“Stay by my side.”

“Feed me.”

“I don’t like it if it’s not Dialin.”

 As a result,

The crazy dog, which she finally made into a human filled with childishness, stubbornness and recklessness, began to burn with obsession.>
